formulas.name: func_Capital_GetKepemilikanAssetLainnya
formulas.expression: IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c}, "Rumah" ), "Rumah; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Ruko/Kios" ), "Ruko/Kios; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Apartemen" ), "Apartemen; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Pribadi" ), "Kendaraan Pribadi; ","") & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Kendaraan Operasional" ), "Kendaraan Operasional; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Mesin Produksi" ), "Mesin Produksi; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Gudang" ), "Gudang; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Tanah" ), "Tanah; ","" ) & IF ( INCLUDES ( {!Get_Curr_Survey.Kepemilikan_Asset_Lainnya__c} , "Aset Lainnya" ), "Aset Lainnya; ","" )
